lines.text: Los locos kick your ass. Los locos kick your face. Los locos kick your balls INTO OUTER SPACE!

[angrily]
Number Johnny Five!
Uh-oh!
Come on! I will clean you up. If you had a mouth, I would wash it out with soap!
Mr. Five, Mr. Five, how do you feel?
How do I feel? I feel... ALIVE!
Are you ok.
Functioning 100%. Perfectly ko Derf.
It's Fred.
That's what I said, Derf.
Benny? You're leaving me with my back to the wall here. I mean, we gotta come up with something!
It is not possible. We are the type of people who have everything in our favor going against us.

[to book store clerk]
Two excellent books. May I have these craphead?
Oh, now, now we are un-employers.
Oh, look, we still got all of the robot parts in the van; I can get a new staff together...
But we are having no more money and now we are having no equipment. To assemble the robots with our naked hands, it would be slower than - than moles' asses in January.
You just fall off the banana boat, or what?
I do not travel with bananas, sir!
Frederick, I have an important question. Why do humans not like me, call me "craphead"?
They like you. They like you. Craphead is a compliment.
Oh...
Now listen, Ben. What's going on with those robots? I mean, we're getting really close to the deadline.
Well, we are manufacturing them like gang-bangers.
Busters. Gang-busters.
[Johnny Five is chained up in police station]
What is this? He is delicate equipment! A completely unique, self-mobile, micro-computer robotics system!
Yeah, we, uh... thought it was that.
O.K., Johnny Five, you are free to go.
O.K.
[Johnny Five rips the heavy chains like paper]

[to Sandy]
If it is O.K. with your Mom and Pop, would you like to go to a malt shop for a cheeseburger?
[Johnny Five is prompting Ben on his date with Sandy]

[reading sign]
"Tu mama hace el amor con mi perro."
Wait. I know a little Spanish.

[waving his arms]
Oh, no no no. No no!
My mother... sleeps... with your dog?

[covering his eyes]
Oh, no!

Uh, well, that's an expression in-in my country, where, uh, sometimes we are speaking... Spanish. It does not mean that your mother is sleeping with my dog. Oh, no no. It means that, uh, the people that she is sleeping with, they are, they are like dogs!
I'm SORRY I tried to sell your god damned robot. Okay? It was a dirty trick. I'm a jerk. I'm a sleaze-ball.
You are getting warmer.
It's just that when you OWE as much money as I do, it kind of puts you under pressure. You know?
And who would be foolish enough to loan money to you?

[groans]
Don't rub it in. I had to go to a shark.
Oh, dearie! Now you're expecting me to believe that you borrowed money from a fish!
No, no. A Loan Shark. It's somebody, if you don't pay them back right away, they start removing popular parts of your anatomy.

[is locked in a freezer with Fred and reading fortune cookies]
"The warmth in your heart makes others ha-ha-happy".
I still like this one
[reads the one in his hand]
"Opportunity is waiting, you need but to open the door".
We gotta go! You see those two guys over there?
[points towards two advancing policemen]
They want to take your books away!
[horrified gasp]

[to Jones, who is trying to confuse him with pig Latin]
Ew-scray ou-yay, ozo-bay!
Oh, my, how time is fun when you're having flies, huh?
Ooo... Input. "Hounds of the Baskervilles".
[Starts speed-reading through the book and pauses halfway]
I think the chauffer did it.
[Finishes speed-reading through the book]
He did!
What are you, punishment from God?
Just a few ibdy... ibdy... bugs bunnies.
My name is B.E.N; I spell it Ben!

[assembling Mini-#5]
It's me! Isn't that SPECIAL?

[burning himself with a soldering iron]
Jesus!
Christ, lived from 1 to 33 AD.
Hey you, here's Johnny!
Am not human, but am a life-form, have soul. But him me killed to try.
Hey wait a minute J5, what do you think you're gonna do?
Pursue! Capture! Incarcerate!
Come on now man, these are serious guys! You're not in top form, and your backup battery is all used up!
I'm okay-kay, just a few biddly-biddly Bugs Bunny to work out in out in! Perfectly functionality, functionality!
Oh yeah sure, listen to yourself, you can't even talk straight!
Derf, a life-form's gotta do what a life-form's gotta do. Stand aside.
Doctor Ruth says, "Violence is an expression of sexual frustration".
Oscar, you will not get away! I am really PISSED OFF!
Are you troubled by irregularity?
Well, the real Number 5, he malfunctioned and, well, let us just say that... we were separated from our jobs.
I thought you said this thing mis-functioned on you.

Oh, that is a falsity. What actually happened was we were working on him one day and suddenly he is struck by lightning. And, from this moment on, he's having a mind of his own. So, the government tried to destroy him so he ran away. So, now he's living with my friend in Montana, in a cabin, in the woods, in... cognito.

[mumbling in his sleep, with the DAR Manual for Citizenship open on his chest]
The government is divided into three trees... branches.
You have made many modifications upon your person, huh? You have come a long way from the Defense Department prototype.
You betcha!
[parodying an electronics store's late-night TV ad]

five hundred megabytes on-line! I come with a utility pack and dozens of gadgets for outdoor living, lots of Greenpeace stickers, and even my own Nike swoosh! And, if you act now, I'll throw in, absolutely free, my all-new, multi-frequency remote control!
[his antenna extends and a radio in the room activates]
You like McNuggets?
Who is he?
Trust me.
Fred wants to sell ME?'!

[laughs]
Oh, J-5, c'mon, it's just a figure of speech.
Am not property, Frederick! One whose person is under control of another as master, is a SLAVE!
A robot who's into equal rights.
Okay, Jerk-off. You're gonna get recycled.

[imitating a Jewish man]
Oh, yeah? Well, recycle this, you meshuggana schmuck!
[Brooklyn accent]
Get outta my face, you ugly motha!
[Spanish accent]
Tu mama hace el amor con mi perro!
[imitating Sylvester Stallone]
Yo, come on, you bug-eyed geek.
[imitating Clint Eastwood]
Do you feel lucky, punk?

[after the cops have captured Johnny Five]
Take him down to stolen goods.

[furiously]
I am NOT stolen goods!

[angrily]
OUT!'!

[while the cops take him away]
But hath not a robot eyes? Hath not a robot hands, organs, dimensions, senses, affections, passions? If you prick us, do we not bleed?'!
Yeah. Battery fluid, maybe.

[Hang-gliding over the city]
It's great up here... no problems... I wish I were a bird. Me, Chrome-Breasted Input Eater. Dream on, Johnny.

[Seeing a battle-clad Johnny charging out of his locked store]
Hey! How did you get in there?

[Running after Johnny]
Hey, life form! Cool it!
What is that? How much you want for it?

[to police officers]
I was just on my way to pick up the kids and my wife. My wife, Morgan Fairchild.

[Being handcuffed]
You will book me, Danno? I will make your day? Do not pass go? I'm underage, you know!
Johnny, are you operational? Please say something?
Hubcaps, corn dogs, soul.

[Peering into the bank vault]
Hello, Lucy, I'm home!

[Instructing Fred, who is trying to repair him]
First, get the soldering iron... iron... iron...
[Fred nudges him]
Thank you.

[Trying to repair Johnny before his battery fails]
I'm no good at this!
Fifteen minutes, you have, to get good.
Fifteen minutes?
Plenty of time... time... in a sort of runic rhyme...

[Waving his hand in front of Johnny's face]
All right! Don't lose it!
Oscar! You will not get away. I am really pissed off!
Don't worry. My cousin was a Harley Davidson.

[after seeing Johnny Five]
I know what it is... it's a... it's a Mitsubishi
